jokes.title: Idiot at the gym
jokes.text: I just saw some idiot at the gym… He put a water bottle in the Pringles holder on the treadmill!

jokes.title: MCAT exam
jokes.text: After an MCAT exam, a father asks his son, "How did it go son?". Young man, looking rather reproachful, replied, "It went well dad. In fact, it went so well that I will retake it again next year."

jokes.title: Can I park here?
jokes.text:
A man pulls up to the curb and asks the policeman, "Can I park here?"
"No," says the cop.
"What about all these other cars?"
"They didn't ask!"

jokes.title: Talent Show
jokes.text:
Father: What did you get that medal for?
Ringo: For singing.
Father: What did you get that big medal for?
Ringo: For stopping.

jokes.title: Horoscope
jokes.text: My horoscope said I was going to get my heart broken in 12 years time… So I bought a puppy to cheer me up.

jokes.title: Saved a friend
jokes.text:
Reporter: What made you go out on that dangerous pond ice and risk your life to save a friend?
Boy: I had to do it. He had my skates on.
